import sys
my_file = sys.stdin
#my_file = open("1input.txt", "r")
n = int(my_file.readline())
a = [int(i) for i in my_file.readline().strip().split()]
a.sort()
def solve():
    turns = 0
    for i in range(1, n+1):
        if a[i-1] < i:
            turns += i - a[i-1]
        elif a[i-1] > i:
            turns += a[i-1] - i
    return turns
print(solve())
